Text: Siobhan Finneran:  She made her screen debut in the 1987 Independent film "Rita, Sue and Bob Too", and subsequently worked consistently in television drama including roles in "Coronation Street", (1989–1990) "Clocking Off" (2000–2002) and "The Amazing Mrs Pritchard" (2006).
